snippet: Myanmar’s reformist president, Thein Sein, will visit the White House next week, the first such trip by a Myanmar head of state in almost 47 years.
abstract: Myanmar’s reformist president, Thein Sein, will visit White House,  first such trip by a Myanmar head of state in almost 47 years and a sign of warming ties.
lead_paragraph: Myanmar’s reformist president, Thein Sein, will visit the White House next week, the first such trip by a Myanmar head of state in almost 47 years.

headline.seo: Myanmar: Leader to Visit White House
headline.main: Myanmar: Leader to Visit White House
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Leader to Visit White House
